subject: fix: static import pwa.js — no race condition, no globals
body:
The dynamic import meant beforeinstallprompt could fire before pwa.js
loaded. Previous "fix" added a window.__pwaInstallPrompt global hack
across three files. Proper fix: static import in main.jsx. Module loads
synchronously, listener is ready before the browser fires the event.
